title: Fix allday events handling
message:
Fix allday events handling

An all day event for say 6.4.2014 in Google calendar
is added to be 6.4.2014 00.00 -- 7.4.2014 00.00 in UTC
time. To get it displayed as only 6.4.2014 we have to
subtract one day. It's a bit tedious but I think it's
clearer to have our internal representation in sync
with the internal representation of the Google
calendar.

title: Make UI smoother
message:
Make UI smoother

Doing the slow operations outside of UI thread
makes the UI a bit more responsive when
scrolling triggers load.

For some reason, implicit func2runnable conversion
does not seem to work, as if it would run the
other lines than the last one in the original thread.

message:
Fix loading window threshold bug

By always loading the whole window, we can solve
the discrepancies between what future and past
loading loads. It's a bit brute force but seems
to be fast enough on my device.

title: Fix focusDay missing events bug
message:
Fix focusDay missing events bug

It's a dangerous idea to always append
focus day with empty event list to events
to be rendered, because this won't work when
the results do not include focus day.

It makes more sense to maintain focus day state
in the model where we know exactly what is
included in the current loaded results.
